summary: Filumena, an ex-prostitute and for decades Domenico Soriano's lover, discovers that he intends to get married and so pretends to be on the verge of death in order to get him to marry her instead.
cast: Titina De Filippo|Eduardo De Filippo|Tamara Lees|Tina Pica|Carlo Pennetti|Gianni Musy|Aldo Giuffr√®|Luigi De Filippo|Rosita Pisano|Domenico Modugno|Marina Campo Re|Vittoria Crispo|Pietro Carloni|Pamela Matthews|Francesco Penza|Pasquale Campagnola
title: Filumena Marturano
